meanings.sent1: I cleaned my ears and found some earwaxes.
meanings.sent2: The doctor removed excess earwaxes from my ear canal.
meanings.sent3: My cat mistook earwaxes for a tasty treat and tried to lick them.
meanings.sent4: The pile of earwaxes on the cotton swab resembled a tiny sculpture.
meanings.sent5: The child was fascinated by the texture and color of the earwaxes.

meanings.definition: The substance secreted in the ear canal.
meanings.sent1: Earwaxes help protect the ear canal from dust and debris.
meanings.sent2: Excessive earwaxes can sometimes cause hearing problems.
meanings.sent3: The earwaxes in my ear canal decided to throw a party and invited bacteria.
meanings.sent4: Her earwaxes were as stubborn as glue, refusing to come out easily.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained the importance of earwaxes in maintaining ear health.
